summary: P1.5 Volatility Attribution Pack - Complete testing of backend APIs and frontend Volatility tab

backend_issues.notes: All backend APIs working correctly with proper data structures

frontend_issues.notes: Volatility tab fully functional with all components properly integrated

passed_tests: Terminal API returns volatility regime and policy correctly
Backend API /api/fractal/v2.1/admin/volatility/attribution returns attribution data with sample, summary, byRegime, equity
Volatility tab shows Header, Timeline, Protection Report, Performance by Regime table
Tab navigation between Overview, Shadow Divergence, and Volatility works
All volatility components load and display data correctly
Timeline visualization shows regime colors and hover tooltips
Protection Report shows Raw vs Scaled performance comparison
Performance by Regime table displays all metrics with proper color coding
